title: Where’s the GOP? | Guests: Stu & Cathy Scheller & Herschel Walker | 9/30/21
description:
Glenn lists many things going on in the country, such as the inflation of gas prices — and blaming inflation on the unvaccinated. Where are all the Republicans standing up against all this? Pat Gray joins to discuss the rising inflation under the Biden administration. The parents of Lt. Col. Stuart Scheller, Stu and Cathy Scheller, join Glenn to discuss their son's imprisonment for demanding accountability for the Afghanistan withdrawal. Glenn rants about the government's intentional unequal treatment of its citizens. Congressional candidate Herschel Walker joins Glenn to discuss his run for U.S. Senate in Georgia and how he plans to unite the state and the country.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
